text: Redi Vogli (born 29 April 1987) is an Albanian professional basketball player who plays for BC Tirana in the Albanian Basketball League as well as the Albania national team.FIBA Europe profileThe 10 sportsmen of 2015 announced in AlbaniaVogli: Tani dua “tripletën” me TiranënALBANIA TAKE FIRST STEP TOWARDS REALISING BASKETBALL VISION ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Albanian men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Tirana Category:Shooting guards
title: Redi Vogli
